query.description: Used to query records that have been added or updated after this time point. Default to the beginning of time of the data store.
Used to query records that have been added or updated before this time point.
The maximum number of records to return per page.

The continuation token returned from a previous class. This must be a valid UUID v4 if provided.
This will override any other pageable parameters provided.

The sort order passed as a parameter, used to control the order of the
search results as a priority ordered list of sorts

There are two orders:
  * ascending: ASC
  * descending: DESC

The following fields are sortable:
  * start

query.value: status eq 'Accepted' or status eq 'Pending' and (id eq 'abc' or id eq 'def')
query.description:
A filter query string narrows search results and supports the combination of logical and comparison operators.
The filter adheres to the pattern filter='field' comparisonType 'value'.
These are the comparison types that can be used in filter expressions:
  * equal: eq
  * not equal: ne
  * greater than: gt
  * greater or equal: ge
  * less than: lt
  * less than or equal: le
  * contains a value: contains

The following fields are filterable:
  * id (eq|ne)
  * start (eq|ne|lt|le|gt|ge)
  * end (eq|ne|lt|le|gt|ge)
  * status (eq|ne)
  * eventStatus (eq|ne) **Note:** Events with a status of `Deleted` are available
    for approximately 24 hours after deletion. After this, they are
    removed and no longer appear in search results.
  * format (eq|ne)
  * title (eq|ne|contains) **Note:** Contains filters must be between 3 and 15 characters.
  * code (eq|ne)
  * description (eq|ne)
  * launchAfter (eq|ne|lt|le|gt|ge)
  * created (eq|ne|lt|le|gt|ge)
  * lastModified (eq|ne|lt|le|gt|ge)
  * closeAfter (eq|ne|lt|le|gt|ge)
  * archiveAfter (eq|ne|lt|le|gt|ge)
  * capacity (eq|ne|lt|le|gt|ge)
  * stakeholder.firstName (eq|ne)
  * stakeholder.lastName (eq|ne)
  * stakeholder.email (eq|ne)
  * stakeholder.company (eq|ne)
  * stakeholder.title (eq|ne)
  * stakeholder.workPhone (eq|ne)
  * note (eq|ne)
  * virtual (eq|ne)
  * planner.firstName (eq|ne)
  * planner.lastName (eq|ne)
  * planner.email (eq|ne)
  * venue.address.city (eq|ne)
  * venue.address.region (eq|ne)
  * venue.address.regionCode (eq|ne)
  * venue.address.country (eq|ne)
  * venue.address.countryCode (eq|ne)
  * customField.{uuid of custom field} (eq|ne|lt|le|gt|ge|sw|contains)
